data.eml:eml: The genus Anisocentropus McLachlan (Trichoptera, Calamoceratidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko, Hayashi, Yumiko, Shimura, Noriyoshi (2012): The genus Anisocentropus McLachlan (Trichoptera, Calamoceratidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 3157: 1-17, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279678
